About Paul

Experienced pipefitter with a passion for technology and a desire to transition into the field of software development. Throughout my career, I have honed my analytical and problem-solving skills, and have a proven track record of delivering high-quality work while adhering to strict safety and quality standards. With a strong foundation in math and logic, as well as an eagerness to learn and adapt, I am excited to bring my technical expertise and attention to detail to the world of software development. I am seeking an opportunity to leverage my transferable skills and continue growing as a software developer.
